item.title: Soccerex press release
item.description: Miami – Futbol Sites, top digital sports media group in Latinamerica, announces a key Media Partnership with Soccerex, leading event...
item.content:encoded:
Miami – Futbol Sites, top digital sports media group in Latinamerica, announces a key Media Partnership with Soccerex, leading event provider for the global soccer industry.

Soccerex Global Convention will take place in Manchester, London from September

4th – 6th, 2017, where more than 3.000 delegates, 450 clubs, 220 media presses and 170 exhibitors will be attending.

“It is a pleasure to close this partnership with Soccerex, promoting their events and amplifying its generated content during the Global Convention, as well as, be an active partner creating content through Soccerex social media channels. This Media Partnership, will allow us to extent our global relationships within the soccer industry, prior the World Cup, most important worldwide event” said Federico Grinberg, CEO of Fultbol Sites.


Futbol Sites, is known as the most growing sport vertical in Latinamerica, with one of the largest audience in its category, reaching more than 25 million of unique users every month on its websites. It operates more than 80 fan pages on Facebook, with more than 30 million fans and 100 million users reached every month.

Soccerex, has been recognized as the leading event provider for the global soccer industry. The Global Convention, gathers top buyers and suppliers to offer a unique commercial environment, where delegates will benefit from exclusive networking and business opportunities, for 3 days at one of the biggest soccer cities in the world.
